pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, August 31, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the National Research Council of Canada (NRC) Royalmount Human Health Therapeutics Research Centre facility, where he will meet with NRC President Iain Stewart and several scientists. An announcement and media availability will follow.

Minister of Innovation, Science and Industry Navdeep Bains, Minister of Economic Development and Official Languages Mélanie Joly, Member of Parliament for Mount Royal Anthony Housefather, and Member of Parliament for Outremont Rachel Bendayan will be in attendance.

NRC Royalmount Human Health Therapeutics Research Centre facility
6100, avenue Royalmount

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity of the meeting
  • Open coverage of the announcement and media availability
  • Media to arrive no later than 9:50 a.m.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#

1:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable with local businesses, to discuss the impacts of COVID-19.

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
